did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Papers of Francis Scott Key 1817 March 24

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Francis Scott Key, Accession #6949-e, Clifton Waller Barrett Library of American Literature, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was deposited by Clifton Waller Barrett on March 17, 1970, and changed to a gift on 1991 July 1.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Key writes that he will go to Baltimore because of Mr. Nicholson's death, mentions Mr. Lloyd and Mrs. Lowndes who will meet him there, other family news.

did.unittitle: Francis Scott Key to Ann Phoebe Key 1817 Mar 24

scopecontent.p: Key writes that he will go to Baltimore because of Mr. Nicholson's death, mentions Mr. Lloyd and Mrs. Lowndes who will meet him there, other family news.
